data.description:
Bring the on-ice hockey experience home with NHL Sense Arena. Step into the virtual arena and experience the fun of playing hockey across a variety of in-game scenarios that will test your skills against computer players or with friends in competitive multiplayer. 

# PLAY AS A GOALIE OR PLAYER
Choose your position and experience immersive gameplay that puts you in the skates of a hockey player.

{373446095707876}

# WIN THE NHL SEASON & STANLEY CUP
Experience 64 games where your hockey skills will be tested across a variety of game situations. Play your favorite NHL team as you battle for victory in the season mode and attempt to win the Stanley Cup!

{417187431275169}

# COMPETE IN MULTIPLAYER
Showcase your hockey skills online with up to 20 players. Compete in a variety of challenges, win trophies, and get ultimate bragging rights! 

{960001219008590}

NHL Sense Arena is packed with tons of content for just $29.99 with our base game which includes:

- NHL Season Mode
- Stanley Cup Playoffs Mode
- 3 Unique Arenas to Play In
- Competitive Multiplayer

Unlock even more in-game content with our training plan options perfect for any hockey player looking to level up their on-ice skills. Annual plan starts at $29/month and our monthly plan is $59/month.

- Everything included in base game
- Unlimited access to 100+ drills
- Training plans from USA Hockey, pro coaches, and NHL players
